word_mean: 心律失常，心律不齐，无节律：心跳的正常节律发生的任何改变，包括窦性心律不齐、早搏、心脏阻滞、心房颤动、心房扑动、交替脉和阵发性心动过速

sentence.Network_en: Sinus arrhythmia also tends to disappear with advancing age.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着年龄的增长,窦性心律不齐也趋于消失.

sentence.Network_en: Palpitation from frequent extrasystoles or other arrhythmia is common.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自频发的期前搏动或其他心律不齐的心悸亦属常见.

sentence.Network_en: This normal variation in rhythm is known as sinus arrhythmia.
sentence.Network_cn: 节律的这种正常变化称为窦性心律失常.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek arruthmia 'lack of rhythm', from a- 'without' + rhuthmos (see rhythm)

means.word_mean: 1. an abnormal rate of muscle contractions in the heart
